detail_desc: Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and covered heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a rib knit with a V-neck front and back, fitted bodice and pleats in the skirt to create width.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a rib knit with a V-neck front and back, fitted bodice and pleats in the skirt to create width.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with flounced trims. High waist with covered elastication at the back, decorative ties at one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a peplum. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a peplum. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a crinkled weave made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top, and buttons down the front. Recycled polyester lining.

Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps that join at the back, and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps that join at the back, and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps that join at the back, and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.

Ankle boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7 cm.

Boots in soft imitation suede made from partly recycled polyester with visible seams. Soft elastic shaft with a loop at the back and block heels. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester. Heels 5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Hi-top trainers with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, decorated in various ways. Adjustable length.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with plumeti. Round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with smocked frill trims. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width. V-neck inner dress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with plumeti. Round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with smocked frill trims. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width. V-neck inner dress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Loop at the front and back and chunky patterned soles. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a tie detail at the top of the front, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a tie detail at the top of the front, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a wide lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, padded hood and practical two-way zip down the front that can open from both directions for easy access. Extra-long sleeves with an inset section in stretch fabric underneath for greater movement and cuffs with thumbholes to help you stay warm outside. Front pockets with a concealed zip for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Lined.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with a soft, stretchy shaft and loop at the back. Jersey linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Heel 5 cm.

Tunic in crisp cotton seersucker with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Seam with a drawstring under the bust and at the back. Lined with a detachable, V-neck inner top in a viscose weave. The inner top has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Tunic in crisp cotton seersucker with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Seam with a drawstring under the bust and at the back. Lined with a detachable, V-neck inner top in a viscose weave. The inner top has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Sports gilet in padded nylon. Hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication around the armholes. The gilet has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Set with two hair clips and two hair elastics. Metal hair clips decorated with plastic beads. Hair elastics decorated with a glittery tulle flower.
Top in woven fabric with wide smocking over the bust. Double-layered frill trim at the top, narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a flared peplum.
Top in woven fabric with wide smocking over the bust. Double-layered frill trim at the top, narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a flared peplum.
Top in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, frill trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Lined.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sturdy stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long, wide raglan sleeves with wide, gathered, close-fitting cuffs and a scalloped hem.

Wide, calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Long, voluminous raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam below the hips. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high slit and gathered elastication at the front for a gentle draped effect. High waist with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Long, voluminous dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, frill trim at the top and low-cut back. Narrow shoulder straps, narrow horizontal ties at the back and a gathered seam below the hips for added width.

Long, voluminous dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, frill trim at the top and low-cut back. Narrow shoulder straps, narrow horizontal ties at the back and a gathered seam below the hips for added width.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with chunky, patterned soles. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.
Top in a stretch rib knit with an off-centre V-neck and short sleeves.
Top in a stretch rib knit with an off-centre V-neck and short sleeves.

Shirt in washed denim with a detachable hood in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the shirt is partly recycled.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Short dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, block heels and fluted soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, block heels and fluted soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
High profile boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip at one side. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 4.5 cm.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with large notch lapels, handwarmer pockets, large flap patch pockets at the front and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester content is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with billowing tulle flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with billowing tulle flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back.
Baby Exclusive. Knee socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated, scallop-edged tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Short, voluminous dress in a cotton weave with a round neckline, wide armholes and long, super-wide sleeves with narrow, close-fitting cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a bell-shaped skirt with inset panels for added width and volume. Lined.

Short, voluminous dress in a cotton weave with a round neckline, wide armholes and long, super-wide sleeves with narrow, close-fitting cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a bell-shaped skirt with inset panels for added width and volume. Lined.

Short, voluminous dress in a cotton weave with a round neckline, wide armholes and long, super-wide sleeves with narrow, close-fitting cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a bell-shaped skirt with inset panels for added width and volume. Lined.
Calf-length trousers in linen. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length trousers in linen. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with crocheted lace sections at the top. Small, scallop-edged stand-up collar with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck, and a gathered yoke at the front.
Ankle boots with a tongue and lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 2.8 cm.
Ankle boots with a tongue and lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 2.8 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigans in soft, organic cotton jersey, one patterned. Buttons and a gathered seam at the top.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and terry appliqué at one side. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a double layer of tulle with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Sturdy denim shorts in a relaxed fit. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with a pleat at the front. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Lightweight jacket in soft faux shearling with flatlock seams and a small appliqué on the chest in woven fabric. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, front welt pockets and jersey trims around the opening and cuffs. Unlined.
Shirt jacket in soft cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with plackets and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt jacket in soft cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with plackets and buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved Henley tops in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline and a button placket.
